content.text: Comments can be used to explain code, and to make it more readable. It can also be used to prevent execution when testing alternative code.
content.html: Comments can be used to explain code, and to make it more readable. It can also be used to prevent execution when testing alternative code.

content.text: Comments can be singled-lined or multi-lined .
Single-line comments start with two forward slashes ( // ).
content.html: Single-line comments start with two forward slashes (//).

content.text: Any text between // and the end of the line is ignored by the compiler (will not be executed).
content.html: Any text between // and the end of the line is ignored by the compiler (will not be executed).

content.text: This example uses a single-line comment before a line of code:
content.html: This example uses a single-line comment before a line of code:

content.code_html:
// This is a comment
printf("Hello World!");

content.text: This example uses a single-line comment at the end of a line of code:
content.html: This example uses a single-line comment at the end of a line of code:

syntaxHighlighting.text: printf("Hello World!"); // This is a comment

syntax_highlighting.text: printf("Hello World!"); // This is a comment

content.text: Multi-line comments start with /* and ends with */ .
content.html: Multi-line comments start with /* and ends with */.

content.text: Any text between /* and */ will be ignored by the compiler:
content.html: Any text between /* and */ will be ignored by the compiler:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* The code below will print the words Hello World!to the screen, and it is 
  amazing */printf("Hello World!");

/* The code below will print the words Hello World!to the screen, and it is 
  amazing */

content.text: It is up to you which you want to use. Normally, we use // for short comments, and /* */ for longer.
content.html: It is up to you which you want to use. Normally, we use // for short comments, and /* */ for longer.

content.text: Good to know: Before version C99 (released in 1999), you could only use multi-line comments in C.
content.html: Good to know: Before version C99 (released in 1999), you could only use multi-line comments in C.
